description: A protocol for contract-initiated offchain data retrieval

scripts.preinstall: for d in client contracts server; do cd $d; echo $(pwd); yarn install || exit; cd -; done
scripts.test: for d in client contracts server; do cd $d; yarn test || exit; cd -; done
scripts.lint: for d in client contracts server; do cd $d; yarn lint || exit; cd -; done
scripts.build: for d in client contracts server; do cd $d; yarn build || exit; cd -; done
scripts.clean: rm -fr node_modules; for d in client contracts server; do cd $d; yarn clean || exit; cd -; done

author: @smartcontractkit
